results.title: Simvastatin Improves Learning and Memory Impairment via Gut-Brain Axis Regulation in an Ovariectomized/D-galactose Alzheimer's Rat Model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Improves @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@Learning and Memory Impairment@@@ via Gut-Brain Axis Regulation in an Ovariectomized/@CHEMICAL_Galactose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005690 @@@D-galactose@@@ @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's@@@ Rat Model.

citations.NLM: Zahedi E, Sanaeierad A, Nikbakhtzadeh M, Roghani M, Zamani E. Simvastatin Improves Learning and Memory Impairment via Gut-Brain Axis Regulation in an Ovariectomized/D-galactose Alzheimer's Rat Model. Behav Brain Res. 2023 Aug 2;():114611. PMID: 37541447

results.title: HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers.
results.text_hl: Our analysis of data indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-treated @CHEMICAL_trimethyltin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C046488 @@@TMT@@@ group has lower @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning and memory deficits@@@ in behavioral tasks comprising Barnes maze, Y maze, and novel object discrimination (NOD).

citations.NLM: Salari A, Roghani M, Khalili M. HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor simvastatin ameliorates trimethyltin neurotoxicity and cognitive impairment through reversal of Alzheimer's-associated markers. Metab Brain Dis. 2024 Dec 20;40(1):74. PMID: 39704877

results.title: Simvastatin enhances learning and memory independent of amyloid load in mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ enhances @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning and@@@ memory independent of @DISEASE_AA_amyloidosis @DISEASE_MESH:C000718787 @@@amyloid@@@ load in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.
